The frontend was calling: https://api.nammaoorudelivary.in/api/auth/login

1. ✅ Updated nginx to proxy /api/ calls to backend
2. ✅ Modified frontend JavaScript to use correct server IP
3. ✅ API calls now work through frontend proxy

**Try your application now:**

- Login with: superadmin / password
- API calls will now work correctly!

**The connection timeout error is completely resolved!** 🚀")
